faq.question: What are the menu items displayed?
faq.answer: Each of the features has been selected to highlight an assortment of menu options from nearby restaurants and bakeries. These are all displayed on the main page!

faq.question: How can I see featured options from only bakeries?
faq.answer: In the navigation bar, click on the desired filter to see features from either restaurants or bakeries.

faq.question: Do you feature other types of eateries?
faq.answer: As of now, no. We are working on expanding our service!

faq.question: Can a restaurant request that its items be featured?
faq.answer: Please leave a message through our contact page!

faq.question: How can I request a theme for the next feature set?
faq.answer: Visit our contact page and leave a message with any suggestions!
